definitions.text: choose and follow; as of theories, ideas, policies, strategies or plans
take up and practice as one's own
take on titles, offices, duties, responsibilities
examples: When will the new President assume office?

definitions.text: take on a certain form, attribute, or aspect
examples: His voice took on a sad tone
The story took a new turn
he adopted an air of superiority
The gods assume human or animal form in these fables
They adopted two children from Nicaragua
adopt a book for a screenplay

definitions.text: take up the cause, ideology, practice, method, of someone and use it as one's own
